title: Analyze Impact of Nuclear Plant Outage on Market Prices
description: A major nuclear power plant has an unplanned outage. A trader needs to quickly assess the likely impact on wholesale power prices for the next 24 hours.

tasks.description: Confirm the size (in MW) of the offline nuclear plant and its typical contribution to regional supply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a 1.2 GW plant is offline, representing 10% of regional baseload.

tasks.description: Analyze the regional supply stack to identify which marginal generators (likely natural gas) will be dispatched to cover the shortfall.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the gas peaker plants that will set the market price.

tasks.description: Forecast the resulting increase in LMPs for the next 24 hours based on the higher cost of marginal generation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent predicts a 30% increase in average LMPs.
